original_text: Many years you bore with them and warned them by your Spirit through your prophets. Yet they would not give ear. Therefore you gave them into the hand of the peoples of the lands.
korean_text: 그러나 주께서 그들을 여러 해 동안 참으시고 또 주의 선지자들을 통하여 주의 영으로 그들을 경계하시되 그들이 듣지 아니하므로 열방 사람들의 손에 넘기시고도

sentences.original_text: Many years you bore with them
sentences.korean_translation: 오랜 세월 동안 당신은 그들을 참으셨습니다

sentences.original_text: and warned them by your Spirit
Yet they would not give ear.
Therefore you gave them into the hand of the peoples of the lands.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 당신은 그들을 그 땅 백성들의 손에 넘기셨습니다
